backlog.title: Price drift detector (real-time)
backlog.rationale: Monitor all markets for sudden moves (>5% in 1h). When detected, follow the move. Informed money signal.
backlog.triageNotes: High impact/effort ratio. Builds on existing price-tracker. Next priority after quick wins.

backlog.title: Hypothesis auto-tester
backlog.rationale: Automated testing framework. Takes hypothesis, executes trades per rules, tracks results, auto-promotes/kills based on performance.
backlog.triageNotes: Core engine capability. Would enable truly autonomous operation. High value but needs careful design.

backlog.title: Backtest framework for strategy validation
backlog.rationale: Currently can only forward-test. Historical data + backtest would accelerate hypothesis validation. Check if Polymarket provides historical data first.
backlog.triageNotes: High effort, unclear if Polymarket historical data is available. Defer until forward-testing is working well.

backlog.title: Audit and improve subagent prompts
backlog.rationale: 8 subagents exist but quality unknown. Review each, test with real tasks, improve underperformers. Better agents = better autonomous operation.
backlog.triageNotes: Covered by weekly agent-review responsibility. Not a separate improvement item - closing.
backlog.outcome: Handled by agent-review standing responsibility instead of separate improvement

completed.title: Daemon pulls git before executing, pushes after
completed.rationale: Ensures state consistency between local dev and droplet. Without this, state can diverge and cause conflicts.
completed.outcome: Added gitPull() before task execution and gitPush() after. Both daemon tick loop and manual trigger command now sync with origin. Handles failures gracefully.

completed.title: Telegram bot receives content and routes to inbox + strategy approval flow
completed.rationale: Enables async communication. User sends content anytime, agent processes. User approves/rejects strategies via Telegram.
completed.outcome: Rewrote handler.ts with: (1) proper inbox.json integration, (2) pending_approvals.json for strategy approval workflow, (3) /pending, /approve, /reject commands, (4) /process to evaluate inbox items, (5) git sync on every action. User flow: send content → /process → agent proposes strategies → /approve or /reject → agent executes.

completed.title: Closing-soon scanner pipeline
completed.rationale: First autonomous pipeline. Every 6h scan markets closing in 72h, check momentum, auto-generate hypotheses. Enables hyp-002 testing at scale.
completed.outcome: Built tools/pipelines/closing-scanner.ts that: (1) fetches markets via Gamma API, (2) filters to closing in 72h, (3) checks momentum signals, (4) auto-generates hypotheses for strong signals, (5) updates engine-status.json. Daemon now handles pipeline tasks directly (no Claude spawn), auto-reschedules recurring pipelines. Added engine health check to daemon tick. Note: price history not yet available - needs imp-003.

completed.title: Price tracking for open positions
completed.rationale: Can't evaluate P&L without current prices. market-watcher agent needs to update portfolio.json with live prices from Polymarket MCP.
completed.outcome: Built tools/pipelines/price-tracker.ts that: (1) fetches prices from CLOB API for known tokens, (2) updates portfolio.json with current prices and P&L, (3) saves price history snapshots, (4) checks exit triggers (TP/SL). Added npm run prices script. AAPL position confirmed at 9¢, same as entry - P&L flat.

completed.title: Leaderboard tracker pipeline
completed.rationale: Daily scrape top traders, track their positions, generate follow signals. Copy smart money strategy.
completed.outcome: Built tools/pipelines/leaderboard-tracker.ts that: (1) fetches profit/volume leaderboards from LB API, (2) tracks positions of top 10 traders, (3) detects consensus signals where 3+ traders hold same position, (4) auto-generates hypotheses for strong signals, (5) saves daily snapshots. Registered as cap-003.

completed.title: Leaderboard scraper for top trader analysis
completed.rationale: Hypothesis hyp-004 requires analyzing top traders. Need tool to fetch and parse leaderboard data. Could reveal edge patterns.
completed.outcome: Superseded by imp-009 (leaderboard-tracker pipeline) which provides the same capability plus additional features.

completed.title: Telegram alerts for position changes and key events
completed.rationale: Keep user informed of agent activity. Alert on: trades executed, hypotheses validated/invalidated, escalation triggers hit.
completed.outcome: Built tools/alerts/telegram-alerts.ts library with typed alert functions for: trade_executed, exit_trigger, hypothesis_update, price_alert, system_alert, daily_summary. Integrated into price-tracker pipeline to send alerts when exit triggers hit or significant price movements occur (>10% change or >$50 P&L change). Registered as cap-006.
